virtual_dev_struct Struct Reference
[Resource Manager for device access]

virtual device structure, which keeps track of the requested physical device. RXBuffer and TXbuffer are kept seperately for each virtual device More...

#include <resource_manager.h>

Detailed Description

virtual device structure, which keeps track of the requested physical device. RXBuffer and TXbuffer are kept seperately for each virtual device
